# Fixed Test Keys (secp256k1)

This file records deterministic private-key/address pairs used in tests.

- Scope: test/dev only, never use in production.
- Signer algorithm: `secp256k1`.
- Address derivation in GTOS:
  - `pub = uncompressed secp256k1 pubkey (65 bytes, 0x04 || X || Y)`
  - `address = Keccak256(pub[1:])` (full 32 bytes, no 20-byte truncation)
  - hex format: `0x` + 64 hex chars

| # | Private Key (hex, 32 bytes) | Derived Address (32-byte) |
|---|---|---|
| 1 | `1111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111` | `0x969b0a11b8a56bacf1ac18f219e7e376e7c213b7e7e7e46cc70a5dd086daff2a` |
